parameter.name: email
parameter.label: Email
parameter.description: The email address used to log in to the SectorAlarm site.

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: The password used to log in to the SectorAlarm site.

parameter.name: alarmSystemCode
parameter.label: Alarm System Code
parameter.description: The Alarm System Code uniquely identifies an alarm system on the SectorAlarm site. It is possible to have multiple alarm systems on the same SectorAlarm account (for example Home and Summer House). These are identified with separate Alarm System Codes.

parameter.name: baseUrl
parameter.label: Base URL
parameter.description: The base URL for accessing the SectorAlarm site.

channel-type.label: Actual alarm state
channel-type.description: The alarm state is either armed (ON) or disarmed (OFF). Note that there is a partially armed state where external alarm sensors are activated usable allowing someone (trusted) in the house. This state is not yet supported.

channel-type.label: Last update
channel-type.description: The last time there was a successful state update.
